snippet.title: Chime Super Deluxe Trailer
snippet.description: Full trailer for the definitive version of the acclaimed musical block puzzle game Chime. Featuring brand new multiplayer modes, a new look and revised game play it is coming exclusively to PlayStation®Network, Spring 2011. Artists include Plaid, Sabrepulse, Shlomo, Moby, Philip Glass, Paul Hartnoll, Fred Deakin
